item.title: 美联储戴利和库格勒强调通胀之战尚未获胜
item.description: 两位美联储官员周六强调，美国央行必须结束与大流行病后的物价飞涨的斗争，实现2%的通胀目标。【原文：Two Federal Reserve officials on Saturday emphasized the US central bank must finish off its fight against the post-pandemic price surge and reach its 2% inflation target.】

item.title: 圭亚那清除沉船以提高石油供应船的安全性
item.description: 圭亚那说，随着为蓬勃发展的石油部门服务的船只数量增加，圭亚那正在齐心协力清除水道中的残骸，改善航运状况。【原文：Guyana said it is making a concerted effort to clear wreckage from its waterways and improve navigation as the number of ships serving the burgeoning oil-sector increases.】

item.title: 中国刺激政策、关税、美联储：2025 年亚洲股市走势
item.description: 迫在眉睫的中美贸易战将考验今年亚洲股市的任何提振希望，尽管中国政府更强有力的刺激措施仍将是该地区投资者关注的重点。【原文：The looming US-China trade war will test any hope for a boost in Asian equities this year, though stronger stimulus measures from Beijing will remain a key focus for investors in the region.】

item.title: 拜登就美国钢铁交易做出决定后，他的轨道出现分歧
item.description: 美国大选两周后，数百名盟友齐聚白宫，安抚落选的乔-拜登。追踪这场闭门狂欢线索的是一个很少对华盛顿例行宣扬感兴趣的群体：套利交易商。【原文：Two weeks after the US election, hundreds of allies gathered at the White House to soothe Joe Biden in defeat. item.title: 债券利差能降到多低？需要关注的五个数字

item.description: 乔-拜登总统将下令禁止在美国沿海约 6.25 亿英亩的土地上开发新的近海石油和天然气，禁止出售大西洋和太平洋水域以及墨西哥湾东部的钻井权。【原文：President Joe Biden is set to order a ban on new offshore oil and gas development across some 625 million acres of US coastal territory, ruling out the sale of drilling rights in Atlantic and Pacific waters as well as the eastern Gulf of Mexico.】

item.title: 汽车制造商降价躲避罚款，英国电动汽车销量激增

item.title: 日本的拒绝表明国家安全随心所欲
item.description: (彭博社）— 几个月来，美国钢铁公司（United States Steel Corp.）一直认为，出售给日本新日铁公司（Nippon Steel Corp.美国总统乔-拜登（Joe Biden）却不这么认为，他认为即使由一家位于亲密盟友日本的公司收购，也不足以消除对国家安全的担忧。【原文：(Bloomberg) — For months, United States Steel Corp. argued that selling out to Japanese-owned Nippon Steel Corp. was the only way to survive. President Joe Biden thought different, concluding that even a takeover by a company based in close ally Japan wasn’t enough to allay national-security concerns.】
